original: Majjhima Nikāya 19
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Dvedhāvitakkasutta
analyzed: dvedhā vitakka sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
analyzed: pubbā iva me bhikkhave sambodhā an abhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa iva sataḥ etat ahosi

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ dvidhā katvā dvidhā katvā vitakke vihareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham dvidhā katvā dvidhā katvā vitakke vihareyyanti

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, yo cāyaṁ kāmavitakko yo ca byāpādavitakko yo ca vihiṁsāvitakko—
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave yaḥ ca ayam kāma vitakkaḥ yaḥ ca byāpāda vitakkaḥ yaḥ ca vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: imaṁ ekaṁ bhāgamakāsiṁ;
analyzed: imam ekam bhāgam akāsi

original: yo cāyaṁ nekkhammavitakko yo ca abyāpādavitakko yo ca avihiṁsāvitakko—
analyzed: yaḥ ca ayam nekkhamma vitakko yaḥ ca a byāpāda vitakko yaḥ ca a vihisā vitakko

original: imaṁ dutiyaṁ bhāgamakāsiṁ.
analyzed: imam dutiyam bhāgam akāsi

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati kāmavitakko.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ uppajjati kāma vitakkaḥ

original: So evaṁ pajānāmi:
analyzed: saḥ u evam pajānāmi

original: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ kāmavitakko.
analyzed: uppannaḥ khalu me ayam kāma vitakkaḥ

original: So ca kho attabyābādhāyapi saṁvattati, parabyābādhāyapi saṁvattati, ubhayabyābādhāyapi saṁvattati, paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko’.
analyzed: saḥ ca kho atta byābādhāya api savattati para byābādhāya api savattati ubhaya byābādhāya api savattati paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: ‘Attabyābādhāya saṁvattatī’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: atta byābādhāya savattati iti pi me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: ‘parabyābādhāya saṁvattatī’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: para byābādhāya me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: ‘ubhayabyābādhāya saṁvattatī’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: ubhaya byābādhāya savattati iti pi me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: ‘paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ ti pi me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, uppannuppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ pajahameva vinodameva byantameva naṁ akāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave uppanna uppannam kāma vitakkam pajaham eva vinodam eva byantam eva nam akāsi

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati byāpādavitakko …pe…
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ uppajjati byāpāda vitakkaḥ pe

original: uppajjati vihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: uppajjati vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: So evaṁ pajānāmi:
analyzed: saḥ u evam pajānāmi

original: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ vihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: uppannaḥ kho me ayam vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: So ca kho attabyābādhāyapi saṁvattati, parabyābādhāyapi saṁvattati, ubhayabyābādhāyapi saṁvattati, paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko’.
analyzed: saḥ ca kho atta byābādhāya api savattati para byābādhāya api savattati ubhaya byābādhāya api savattati paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: ‘Attabyābādhāya saṁvattatī’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: atta byābādhāya savattati iti pi me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: ‘parabyābādhāya saṁvattatī’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: para byābādhāya me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: ‘ubhayabyābādhāya saṁvattatī’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: ubhaya byābādhāya savattati iti pi me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: ‘paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko’tipi me, bhikkhave, paṭisañcikkhato abbhatthaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ ti pi me bhikkhave paṭisañcikkhataḥ abbhattham gacchati

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, uppannuppannaṁ vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ pajahameva vinodameva byantameva naṁ akāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave uppanna uppannam vihisā vitakkam pajaham eva vinodam eva byantam eva nam akāsi

original: Yaññadeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicāreti, tathā tathā nati hoti cetaso.
analyzed: yaññat eva bhikkhave bhikkhu bahulam anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tathā tathā hoti cetasaḥ

original: Kāmavitakkañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicāreti, pahāsi nekkhammavitakkaṁ, kāmavitakkaṁ bahulamakāsi, tassa taṁ kāmavitakkāya cittaṁ namati.
analyzed: kāma vitakkam ce bhikkhave bhikkhu bahulam anuvitakketi anuvicāreti pahāsi nekkhamma vitakka kāma vitakkam bahulam akāsi tassa tam kāma vitakkāya cittam namati

original: Byāpādavitakkañce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: byāpāda vitakkañce bhikkhave pe

original: vihiṁsāvitakkañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicāreti, pahāsi avihiṁsāvitakkaṁ, vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ bahulamakāsi, tassa taṁ vihiṁsāvitakkāya cittaṁ namati.
analyzed: vihisā vitakkam ce bhikkhave bhikkhu bahulam anuvitakketi anuvicāreti pahāsi a vihisā vitakka vihisā vitakkam bahulam akāsi tassa tam vihisā vitakkāya cittam namati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vassānaṁ pacchime māse saradasamaye kiṭṭhasambādhe gopālako gāvo rakkheyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave vassānam pacchime māse sarada samaye kiṭṭha sambādhe gopālakaḥ gāvaḥ rakkheyya

original: So tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyya paṭikoṭeyya sannirundheyya sannivāreyya.
analyzed: saḥ tāḥ gāvaḥ tatas tatas daṇḍena ākoṭeyya paṭikoṭeyya sannirundheyya sannivāreyya

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Passati hi so, bhikkhave, gopālako tatonidānaṁ vadhaṁ vā bandhanaṁ vā jāniṁ vā garahaṁ vā.
analyzed: passati hi saḥ bhikkhave gopālakaḥ tatonidānam vadham vā bandhanam vā jānim vā garaham vā

original: Evameva kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, addasaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṅkilesaṁ, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ vodānapakkhaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho aha bhikkhave addasam akusalānam dhammānam ādīnavam okāram saṅkilesa kusalānam dhammānam nekkhamme ānisasam vodāna pakkha

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati nekkhammavitakko.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ uppajjati nekkhamma vitakko

original: So evaṁ pajānāmi:
analyzed: saḥ u evam pajānāmi

original: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ nekkhammavitakko.
analyzed: uppannaḥ kho me ayam nekkhamma vitakkaḥ

original: So ca kho nevattabyābādhāya saṁvattati, na parabyābādhāya saṁvattati, na ubhayabyābādhāya saṁvattati, paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko’.
analyzed: saḥ ca kho nevatta byābādhāya savattati na para byābādhāya savattati na ubhaya byābādhāya savattati paññāvuddhikaḥ avighāta pakkhikaḥ nibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Rattiñcepi naṁ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyyaṁ anuvicāreyyaṁ, neva tatonidānaṁ bhayaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: rattim ce pi na bhikkhave anuvitakkeyyam anuvicāreyya na iva tatonidānam bhayam samanupassāmi

original: Divasañcepi naṁ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyyaṁ anuvicāreyyaṁ, neva tatonidānaṁ bhayaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: divasam ce pi na bhikkhave anuvitakkeyyam anuvicāreyya na iva tatonidānam bhayam samanupassāmi

original: Rattindivañcepi naṁ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyyaṁ anuvicāreyyaṁ, neva tatonidānaṁ bhayaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: na bhikkhave anuvitakkeyyam anuvicāreyya na iva tatonidānam bhayam samanupassāmi

original: Api ca kho me aticiraṁ anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato kāyo kilameyya.
analyzed: api ca khalu me aticiram anuvitakkayataḥ anuvicārayataḥ kāyaḥ kilameyya

original: Kāye kilante cittaṁ ūhaññeyya.
analyzed: kāye kilante cittam

original: Ūhate citte ārā cittaṁ samādhimhāti.
analyzed: ūhate citte ārā cittam samādhim hāti

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, ajjhattameva cittaṁ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṁ karomi samādahāmi.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave ajjhattam eva cittam saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodim karomi samādahāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: ‘Mā me cittaṁ ūhaññī’ti.
analyzed: mā me cittam ūhaññī iti

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati abyāpādavitakko …pe…
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ uppajjati a byāpāda vitakkaḥ pe

original: uppajjati avihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: uppajjati a vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: So evaṁ pajānāmi:
analyzed: saḥ u evam pajānāmi

original: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṁ avihiṁsāvitakko.
analyzed: uppannaḥ kho me ayam a vihisā vitakkaḥ

original: So ca kho nevattabyābādhāya saṁvattati, na parabyābādhāya saṁvattati, na ubhayabyābādhāya saṁvattati, paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko’.
analyzed: saḥ ca kho nevatta byābādhāya savattati na para byābādhāya savattati na ubhaya byābādhāya savattati paññāvuddhikaḥ avighāta pakkhikaḥ nibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Rattiñcepi naṁ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyyaṁ anuvicāreyyaṁ, neva tatonidānaṁ bhayaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: rattim ce pi na bhikkhave anuvitakkeyyam anuvicāreyya na iva tatonidānam bhayam samanupassāmi

original: Divasañcepi naṁ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyyaṁ anuvicāreyyaṁ, neva tatonidānaṁ bhayaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: divasam ce pi na bhikkhave anuvitakkeyyam anuvicāreyya na iva tatonidānam bhayam samanupassāmi

original: Rattindivañcepi naṁ, bhikkhave, anuvitakkeyyaṁ anuvicāreyyaṁ, neva tatonidānaṁ bhayaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: na bhikkhave anuvitakkeyyam anuvicāreyya na iva tatonidānam bhayam samanupassāmi

original: Api ca kho me aticiraṁ anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato kāyo kilameyya.
analyzed: api ca khalu me aticiram anuvitakkayataḥ anuvicārayataḥ kāyaḥ kilameyya

original: Kāye kilante cittaṁ ūhaññeyya.
analyzed: kāye kilante cittam

original: Ūhate citte ārā cittaṁ samādhimhāti.
analyzed: ūhate citte ārā cittam samādhim hāti

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, ajjhattameva cittaṁ saṇṭhapemi, sannisādemi, ekodiṁ karomi samādahāmi.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave ajjhattam eva cittam saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodim karomi samādahāmi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: ‘Mā me cittaṁ ūhaññī’ti.
analyzed: mā me cittam ūhaññī iti

original: Yaññadeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicāreti, tathā tathā nati hoti cetaso.
analyzed: yaññat eva bhikkhave bhikkhu bahulam anuvitakketi anuvicāreti tathā tathā hoti cetasaḥ

original: Nekkhammavitakkañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicāreti, pahāsi kāmavitakkaṁ, nekkhammavitakkaṁ bahulamakāsi, tassaṁ taṁ nekkhammavitakkāya cittaṁ namati.
analyzed: nekkhamma vitakkam ce bhikkhave bhikkhu bahulam anuvitakketi anuvicāreti pahāsi kāma vitakka nekkhamma vitakkam bahulam akāsi tassam tam nekkhamma vitakkāya cittam namati

original: Abyāpādavitakkañce, bhikkhave …pe…
analyzed: a byāpāda vitakkañce bhikkhave pe

original: avihiṁsāvitakkañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bahulamanuvitakketi anuvicāreti, pahāsi vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ, avihiṁsāvitakkaṁ bahulamakāsi, tassa taṁ avihiṁsāvitakkāya cittaṁ namati.
analyzed: a vihisā vitakkam ce bhikkhave bhikkhu bahulam anuvitakketi anuvicāreti pahāsi vihisā vitakka a vihisā vitakkam bahulam akāsi tassa tam a vihisā vitakkāya cittam namati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gimhānaṁ pacchime māse sabbasassesu gāmantasambhatesu gopālako gāvo rakkheyya, tassa rukkhamūlagatassa vā abbhokāsagatassa vā satikaraṇīyameva hoti:
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave gimhānam pacchime māse sabba sassesu gāmanta sambhatesu gopālakaḥ gāvaḥ rakkheyya tassa rukkha mūla gatassa vā abbhokāsa gatassa vā sati karaṇīyam eva hoti

original: ‘etā gāvo’ti.
analyzed: etāḥ gāvaḥ iti

original: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, satikaraṇīyameva ahosi:
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave sati karaṇīyam eva ahosi

original: ‘ete dhammā’ti.
analyzed: ete dhammā ati

original: Āraddhaṁ kho pana me, bhikkhave, vīriyaṁ ahosi asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggaṁ.
analyzed: āraddham kho pana me bhikkhave vīriyam ahosi a sallīnaḥ upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekagga

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja vihāsi

original: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam upasampajja vihāsi

original: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca vihāsiṁ sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedesiṁ,
analyzed: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca vihāsim sato ca sampajāno sukham ca kāyena paṭisavedesi

original: yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: yam tam ariyāḥ ācikkhanti upekkhakaḥ satimā sukha vihārī iti tatiyam jhānam upasampajja vihāsi

original: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbā iva somanassa domanassānam atthaṅgamā adukkham asukham upekkhā sati pārisuddhim catuttham jhānam upasampajja vihāsi

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmesi

original: So anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarāmi. Seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarāmi.
analyzed: saḥ aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarāmi jātim pe iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarāmi

original: Ayaṁ kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyā paṭhame yāme paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā;
analyzed: ayam kho me bhikkhave rattiyā paṭhame yāme paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā

original: avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā; tamo vihato āloko uppanno; yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
analyzed: avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamaḥ vihataḥ ālokaḥ uppannaḥ yathā tam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharato

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṁ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte sattānam cutūpapāta ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmesi

original: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne
analyzed: so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne

original: …pe… ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā …pe… iti dibbena cakkhunā
analyzed: pe ime vata bhonto sattā kāya duccaritena samannāgatā pe iti dibbena cakkhunā

original: visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe
analyzed: visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe

original: dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate, yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi.
analyzed: dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi

original: Ayaṁ kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyā majjhime yāme dutiyā vijjā adhigatā;
analyzed: ayam kho me bhikkhave rattiyā majjhime yāme dutiyā vijjā adhigatā

original: avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā; tamo vihato āloko uppanno; yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
analyzed: avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamaḥ vihataḥ ālokaḥ uppannaḥ yathā tam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharato

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte āsavānam khaya ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmesi

original: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṁ
analyzed: so idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam dukkha samudayaḥ iti yathābhūta

original: abbhaññāsiṁ, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī
analyzed: abbhaññā asi ayam dukkha nirodho ti yathābhūtam abbhaññā asi ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī

original: paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ.
analyzed: paṭipadā ati yathābhūtam

original: ‘Ime āsavā’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ‘ayaṁ āsavasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ,
analyzed: ime āsavā ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam āsava samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi

original: ‘ayaṁ āsavanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ‘ayaṁ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti
analyzed: ayam āsava nirodho ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam āsava nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati

original: yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ.
analyzed: yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi

original: Tassa me evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha, bhavāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha, avijjāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha, vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ ahosi:
analyzed: tassa me evam jānataḥ evam passataḥ kāma āsavā api cittam vimuccittha bhava āsavā api cittam vimuccittha avijja āsavā api cittam vimuccittha vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam ahosi

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsiṁ.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati

original: Ayaṁ kho me, bhikkhave, rattiyā pacchime yāme tatiyā vijjā adhigatā;
analyzed: ayam kho me bhikkhave rattiyā pacchime yāme tatiyā vijjā adhigatā

original: avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā; tamo vihato āloko uppanno; yathā taṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.
analyzed: avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamaḥ vihataḥ ālokaḥ uppannaḥ yathā tam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharato

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, araññe pavane mahantaṁ ninnaṁ pallalaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave araññe pavane mahantam ninnam pallala

original: Tamenaṁ mahāmigasaṅgho upanissāya vihareyya.
analyzed: tam enam mahā miga saṅghaḥ upanissāya vihareyya

original: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya anatthakāmo ahitakāmo ayogakkhemakāmo.
analyzed: tassa kocid eva purisaḥ uppajjeyya anattha kāmaḥ ahita kāmaḥ a yogakkhema kāmaḥ

original: So yvāssa maggo khemo sovatthiko pītigamanīyo taṁ maggaṁ pidaheyya, vivareyya kummaggaṁ, odaheyya okacaraṁ, ṭhapeyya okacārikaṁ.
analyzed: so yvā assa maggaḥ khemaḥ sovatthiko pīti gamanīyo tam maggam pidaheyya vivareyya kummagge odaheyya oka cara ṭhapeyya oka cārika

original: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, mahāmigasaṅgho aparena samayena anayabyasanaṁ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: evam hi saḥ bhikkhave mahā miga saṅghaḥ aparena samayena anaya byasanam āpajjeyya

original: Tasseva kho pana, bhikkhave, mahato migasaṅghassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakāmo hitakāmo yogakkhemakāmo.
analyzed: tassa iva kho pana bhikkhave mahataḥ miga saṅghassa kocid eva purisaḥ uppajjeyya attha kāmaḥ hita kāmaḥ yogakkhema kāmaḥ

original: So yvāssa maggo khemo sovatthiko pītigamanīyo taṁ maggaṁ vivareyya, pidaheyya kummaggaṁ, ūhaneyya okacaraṁ, nāseyya okacārikaṁ.
analyzed: so yvā assa maggaḥ khemaḥ sovatthiko pīti gamanīyo tam maggam vivareyya pidaheyya kummaggaḥ ūhaneyyaḥ oka cara nāseyyaḥ oka cārika

original: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, mahāmigasaṅgho aparena samayena vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: evam hi saḥ bhikkhave mahā miga saṅghaḥ aparena samayena vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjeyya

original: Upamā kho me ayaṁ, bhikkhave, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
analyzed: upamā kho me bhikkhave katā atthassa viññāpanāya

original: Ayaṁ cevettha attho—
analyzed: ayam ca iva ettha atthaḥ

original: mahantaṁ ninnaṁ pallalanti kho, bhikkhave, kāmānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: mahantam ninnam pallalanti kho bhikkhave kāmānam etam

original: Mahāmigasaṅghoti kho, bhikkhave, sattānametaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: mahā miga saṅghaḥ iti kho bhikkhave sattānam etam

original: Puriso anatthakāmo ahitakāmo ayogakkhemakāmoti kho, bhikkhave, mārassetaṁ pāpimato adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: purisaḥ anattha kāmaḥ ahita kāmaḥ a yogakkhema kāmaḥ ti kho bhikkhave mārassa etat pāpimataḥ adhivacana

original: Kummaggoti kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhaṅgikassetaṁ micchāmaggassa adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: kummaggaḥ ti kho bhikkhave aṭṭhaṅgikassa etam micchāmaggassa adhivacana

original: micchādiṭṭhiyā micchāsaṅkappassa micchāvācāya micchākammantassa micchāājīvassa micchāvāyāmassa micchāsatiyā micchāsamādhissa.
analyzed: micchā diṭṭhiyā micchā saṅkappassa micchā vācāya micchā kammantassa micchā ājīvassa micchā vāyāmassa micchā satiyā micchā samādhissa

original: Okacaroti kho, bhikkhave, nandīrāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: kho bhikkhave nandī rāgassa itam

original: Okacārikāti kho, bhikkhave, avijjāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: oka cārikā ati kho bhikkhave adhivacana

original: Puriso atthakāmo hitakāmo yogakkhemakāmoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: purisaḥ attha kāmaḥ hita kāmaḥ yogakkhema kāmaḥ iti kho bhikkhave tathāgatassa itam adhivacanam arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Khemo maggo sovatthiko pītigamanīyoti kho, bhikkhave, ariyassetaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: khemaḥ maggo sovatthiko pīti gamanīyaḥ ti kho bhikkhave ariyassa etam aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacana

original: sammādiṭṭhiyā sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācāya sammākammantassa sammāājīvassa sammāvāyāmassa sammāsatiyā sammāsamādhissa.
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhiyā sammā saṅkappassa sammā vācāya sammā kammantassa sammā ājīvassa sammā vāyāmassa sammā satiyā sammā samādhissa

original: Iti kho, bhikkhave, vivaṭo mayā khemo maggo sovatthiko pītigamanīyo, pihito kummaggo, ūhato okacaro, nāsitā okacārikā.
analyzed: iti kho bhikkhave vivaṭaḥ mayā khemaḥ maggo sovatthiko pīti gamanīyaḥ pihitaḥ kummaggaḥ ūhataḥ oka caraḥ nāsitāḥ oka cārikā

original: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
analyzed: ya bhikkhave satthārā karaṇīyam sāvakānam hita īsinā anukampakena anukampam upādāya katam vaḥ tam mayā

original: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni; jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
analyzed: etāni bhikkhave rukkha mūlāni etāni suññāgārāni jhāyatha bhikkhave mā pamādattha mā pacchā vippaṭisārinaḥ ahuvattha ayam vaḥ amhākam anusāsanī iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Dvedhāvitakkasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: dvedhāvitakka suttam niṭṭhitam navama
